item.description:
We have been invited by the Canadian Consular General to attend a special Canada Day Reception on July 1. It will take place from 3-6 PM on the HMCS Iroquois, a Canadian Destroyer. This will not only celebrate the birth of our country but also the 200th anniversary of the war of 1812. Due to the uniqueness of this event we only have 15 spots available at this time. It is anticipated that extra spots will open up. The dress code is summer whites for Military Personel and business casual for civilians. This event will take place on the HMCS Iroquois and I will email you directly with the exact location of the event. This will be a great way to celebrate Canada Day.

 

Hope you can make it.

group.name: The Boston Expat Canadian Meetup Group

item.name: Canada Day on a Boat
